title: Paid Advertising Retargeting Strategies With Show Me The Nuggets Host Joe Troyer
itunes:title: Paid Advertising Retargeting Strategies With Show Me The Nuggets Host Joe Troyer
description:
Every real business does paid advertising. Some do it good, and some suck shit. You’re about to learn a simple retargeting method that will impact your bank account in a big way.
 
Joe Troyer is the founder of Digital Triggers, CMO & Partner at InvisiblePPC, and host of the top-rated podcast Show Me The Nuggets.
 
In this interview, Joe shows us the exact blueprint to his winning retargeting strategy that grows his audience and his agency.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/162
